detectors.description:
BPTPoolKIF.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BPTPoolKIF.sol#711-727) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BPTPoolKIF.sol#717)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BPTPoolKIF.sol#720)
